markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Warden's Signet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2330)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 151 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This symbol shows your dedication to the magic practiced by some [rangers](/Classes.aspx?ID=9). Most rangers wear it on an amulet, ring, or piercing. You gain a +2 item bonus to [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) checks.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a ranger warden spell. When you use this Focus Point, the _warden’s signet_ also casts a 4th-rank [_oaken resilience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1617) spell on you. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

**Craft Requirements** You are a ranger with at least one warden spell.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Warden's Signet
